## flatMapArray() function

Performs flatMap over provided array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function flatMapArray<TItem>(array: TItem[][]): TItem[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>TItem[][]</code> | Array to be reduced using flatMap |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TItem[]`
